document.full_text: u.n. secretary-general ban ki-moon said he lacks the authority to personally order a probe into the mass killings of civilians in the final months of sri lanka's civil war, as a report recommended on monday.
document.title: u.n. chief says can't order probe into sri lanka war
lines_and_colors: u.n. secretary-general ban ki-moon said he lacks the authority to personally order a probe into the mass killings of civilians in the final months of sri lanka's civil war, as a report recommended on monday.
